skins.shipDescription: Myoukou-class heavy cruiser number three - Ashigara
skins.selfIntroduction: I am Ashigara, third ship of the Myoukou-class heavy cruisers. I had the privilege and glory of representing the Sakura Empire in the Royals' Coronation Fleet Review. My habitability? W-well... some things must be sacrificed in order to survive on the battlefield.
skins.acquisition: Ashigara, reporting for duty. Commander, my blade shall cut down all your enemies.
skins.login: You're finally back... Commander, would you spare some time to spar with me?
skins.details: No matter how much you stare at me, I won't get any stronger... Commander, wouldn't it be better for me to sortie?
skins.secretaryIdle1: "Let your victories not be decided by the strength of your equipment, but by your abilities." That is what Myoukou taught me.
skins.secretaryIdle2: "Let those who think of the Sakura Empire also think of your name?" Hmm... Yes, that is a goal that I indeed have been working towards.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, thank you for training with me every day. I'll continue to refine myself!
skins.secretaryTouch: I got this from Myoukou. I often record what she says, so I can listen to her words when I have free time. Eh? Is that weird?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Ack...! U-um... I need to ask Myoukou about what I should do in this situation...

skins.shipDescription: Phew... I finally managed to fix my dress... but I just can't seem to get used to it. Commander, how does my dress look? It's not strange, is it?
skins.acquisition: Phew... I finally managed to fix my dress... but I just can't seem to get used to it. Commander, how does my dress look? It's not strange, is it?
skins.login: You'd like to train with me? Of course! Even dressed like this, I have no intention of losing!
skins.details: "There's no need to overexert yourself." That's what Myoukou told me, anyway. Commander, hopefully you're not pushing yourself too hard?
skins.secretaryIdle1: It's hard to put my hair up like this... Thanks to Myoukou's help, I was somehow able to manage...
skins.secretaryIdle2: I can't sit here doing nothing all the time... Commander, if there's anything you need help with, please give me the order!
skins.secretaryIdle3: This is how you do the lap pillow thing, right? I heard that it would help you recover from fatigue...
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Umm... C-Commander, Myoukou said that you shouldn't do stuff like this...

skins.shipDescription: This whole "fashion coordination" concept is still a bit hard for me to wrap my head around, so I'm glad Nachi helped me pick out a swimsuit. Now, I just need to... Hey, Commander! Open your mouth! H-huh?! But this is what Nachi told me to do... is there some sort of problem?!
skins.acquisition: This whole "fashion coordination" concept is still a bit hard for me to wrap my head around, so I'm glad Nachi helped me pick out a swimsuit. Now, I just need to... Hey, Commander! Open your mouth! H-huh?! But this is what Nachi told me to do... is there some sort of problem?!
skins.login: The cool, pristine waves splashing across my skin... What a comforting sensation.
skins.details: I originally planned to bring headphone to listen to the soothing sound of Myoukou's... Err, I meant to say music! But, it might be more calming to just listen to the waves.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Under the azure skies, the seagulls and crabs also thrive... the summer seaside also has life of its own.
skins.secretaryIdle2: I promised to play beach volleyball with Myoukou and Nachi, but we have an odd number of people... Commander, why don't you join us?
skins.secretaryIdle3: Myoukou, I brought my training equipment. Today's regiment is... Oh, I don't need it today?
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, did you want to take a break? ...Ahem! H-h-how about a l-l-lap pillow?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Eep?! ...Oh, I had cream stuck on me? Th-thank you, Commander...
